name: habit-tracker-heatmap
description: GitHub-style contribution heatmap for Obsidian Bases

scripts.install: npm run build && DEST=${OBS_VAULT_DIR:-"$HOME/Obsidian/My Second Brain"}; mkdir -p "$DEST"/.obsidian/plugins/habit-tracker-heatmap/ && cp main.js manifest.json "$DEST"/.obsidian/plugins/habit-tracker-heatmap/
